page.title: 05ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: THERE ARE FEW LARGE PARKS IN THE AREA BUT VARIOUS OTHER ATTRACTIONS COMPENSATE.LOCAL LIBRARIES PROVIDE A LENDING SERVICE FOR BOOKS AND AUDIO CASSETTES.THE{MITCHELL LIBRARY}IS THE MAIN REFERENCE LIBRARY IN THE AREA.SOUTH OF THE RIVER,THE TRANSPORT MUSEUM IS WELL WORTH A VISIT. THEATRE IS ALIVE AND WELL,WITH FOUR MAIN ONES TO CHOOSE FROM.THESE RANGE FROM THE{'THEATRE ROYAL'}IN THE NORTH TO THE{'CITIZENS'}IN THE SOUTH. CINEMA CATERS FOR ALL TASTES ALTHOUGH THE HOME VIDEO MARKET IS AFFECTING AUDIENCES.IF FOOD IS YOUR FANCY, THERE ARE MANY NEW FRENCH STYLE CAFES WHICH ALONG WITH A WIDE VARIETY OF EATING PLACES PROVIDE ANYTHING FROM A CROISSANT AND COFFEE,TO A CHOW MEIN.
